entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Last Mountain 1:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: SSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
